desc: MiteXstream™ is a minimum risk biochemical miticide that controls mites, molds, and mildew infestation on a multitude of plants. It is ideal for mite control in integrated pest management (IPM) and can be used alone or in rotation with other miticides.

layout.text: Eliminates Molds and Mildews, including Powdery Mildew, and Pests, including Spider Mites!
